name: Savory Soup
text:
You can still enjoy comfort food even if you’re already comfortable.

Acquired by winning 5 games in ranked mode, January 2023.

name: Present
text:
Your old card back’s the past, tomorrow’s is the future, but this one is a gift.

Acquired by winning 5 games in ranked mode, December 2022.

name: Jaraxxustein
text:
The perfect card back for your more experimental decks.

Obtainable by purchasing in the shop.

name: The Lich King
text:
The very mention of this cardback's namesake will send a chill through your deck.

Obtainable by participating in a special event.

name: Lor'themar
text:
Lor'themar has one motto that he's always lived by: dignity, always dignity.

Obtainable by purchasing in the shop.

name: Overwatch
text:
The cavalry's here!

Obtained by participating in an Overwatch event or purchasing in the shop.
